dt: {bc}affected by strong feelings of love, admiration, or fascination

dt.t: Japanese fans took to the gruff Americans, but the homegrown players were less {wi}enamored{/wi}.
… he would be {wi}enamored{/wi} of a particular wine for a while, and then switch to a new one that caught his fancy.
How did we get to be so {wi}enamored{/wi} of the outdoors?
Wild mushrooms were my first love. Long before I became {wi}enamored{/wi} with green plants, I was stalking mushrooms …

shortdef: affected by strong feelings of love, admiration, or fascination
